description:
During the march to war against the Demon Lord: When Keiji visits Chosokabe and Mori to persuade them to join the alliance, Oda’s minions arrive to issue a very serious threat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash in the Inland Sea of Seto! Fugaku, the Great Fire-Belching Fortress of the Sea!
Setonai no Gekitotsu! Hi o Fuku Umi no Daiyousai - Fugaku!!
瀬戸内の激突! 火を噴く海の大要塞・富嶽!!
